alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 20 at 10:28AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM AKDT SUNDAY ALONG THE KUSKOKWIM RIVER NEAR KWETHLUK... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam continues. * WHERE...For the Kuskokwim River near Kwethluk. * WHEN...Until 700 PM AKDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Flooding in Kwethluk continues with water overflowing onto roads. Flooding can be expected to continue until levels on the Kuskokwim near Kwethluk begin to recede. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1025 AM AKDT, The Alaska State Defense Force reports the water was up to the banks in Kwethluk last night and has significantly overflowed into the village yesterday. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood - Please stay tuned to weather.gov/Anchorage, NOAA weather radio or your favorite local weather news source for updates on this situation.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
